function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Loss of trust in official governmental media","Impact":"Increased likelihood of being misled by false information and producing erroneous risk assessments","Mitigation":"Open, timely, and honest official governmental information","Technologies":"Improved communication technologies for transparent information sharing","People":"Public","Owner":"Government and media organizations"},{"Description":"Gender and age differences in embracing protective behaviors","Impact":"Reduced adoption of protective behaviors among certain demographics","Mitigation":"Tailored education and communication strategies for different demographic groups","Technologies":"Targeted messaging and educational materials for specific demographics","People":"Women, older people, men, and younger individuals","Owner":"Public health organizations and community leaders"},{"Description":"Non-representative online survey sample","Impact":"Inaccurate findings and associations due to sample bias","Mitigation":"Data correction and sampling methods to improve representativeness","Technologies":"Advanced survey sampling and data correction methods","People":"Researchers and survey participants","Owner":"Research institutions and survey organizations"}]}
